Message:
To prepare for when the
world would fall into chaos,
she forged a sword,
giving it the will to choose
its own master.

What’s more, she created
a legend born from a lie
so the yet unknown master
would travel the land
with the sword.

“This sword will drain the life
of the one who discovers it
unless its true master is found.”

That was the true story
of this sword...
A story I learned
while I was dreaming.

When I woke up
in the Duke’s mansion,
next to me, unsurprisingly,
was the sword.

So this means...this sword’d
chosen me right from the start,
and all that stuff about it
draining my life away was a lie.

...Hold up!
Don’t think for one second
you’re getting away with this!
My lifelong dream vacation’s
still waiting for me!

If it comes down to it,
I’ll spend the rest of my life
finding you a better master,
and make ’em take ya.

That’ll settle my debt
to you for saving me!
